hint.text: \(No. \, of \, votes = \frac{sector \,angle}{360} \times Total\, number\, of\, people\)

solution.text:
Central angle for kabaddi \(=36\) degrees
Total number of votes \(=_{{j*5000}}_\)
Therefore, No. of votes for kabaddi \(=\frac {36}{360} \times _{{j*5000}}_\)
\(=_{{j*500}}_\)

content.text: How many votes did kabaddi get from a total of \(_{{j*5000}}_\) votes?
